== Puthige (627091) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Puthige is a village in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 592 hectares and harbouring 928 households with total population of 5441 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 14 km. Male population is 2852 and female population is 2589. Scheduled Caste Population is 241 and Scheduled Tribes population is 41. Census Location Code of the village is 627091<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 4344 (79.84%)
* Literate male population: 2375 (83.27%)
* Literate female population: 1969 (76.05%)
